name: Medal of Honor: Heroes
description:
Take all the glory and intensity of MOH's authentic WWII action on-the-go for the first time with Medal of Honor Heroes™. Return to the frontlines as Lt. Jimmy Patterson, Sgt. John Baker, and Lt. William Holt—all legendary Medal of Honor™ heroes—in a brand-new storyline exclusively for the PSP® system. Travel to authentic European WWII battlegrounds and demonstrate your courage under fire in brand-new missions that feature open-ended gameplay and multiple scenario paths. All of this is rendered in stunning detail with the authenticity Medal of Honor™ fans have come to expect.
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
